definition: A checkbox showing a check mark inside the box. Not to be confused with the similarly named Ballot Box With Ballot emoji. Ballot Box With Ch http://emojipedia.org/ballot-box-with-check/
name: ballot box with check

bn:00100490a: Free from error; true; the state of having an affirmed truth.
That are in accordance with fact.
Free from error; especially conforming to fact or truth

bn:00095572v: To express one's preference for a candidate in a public consultation; to cast a vote.
To cast a vote; to assert a formalised choice in an election.
Express one's preference for a candidate or for a measure or resolution; cast a vote

bn:00017986n: A check mark, checkmark or tick is a mark used to indicate the concept "yes" applies to me").
A mark () made to indicate agreement, correctness or acknowledgement
A mark (?) made to indicate agreement, correctness or acknowledgement; checkmark
A mark like a v or sometimes x used as an indicator.
A mark (especially a checkmark: ) used as an indicator, equivalent to a tick (UK).
A mark (often one of a series) made to show that an operation or task has been completed.
A mark made to indicate agreement, correctness or acknowledgement.
A mark () made to indicate agreement, correctness or acknowledgement.
A mark indicating that something has been noted or completed etc.

note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
